projects.title: BizGPT
projects.description: First version of the BizGPT project. Based on the Multipliers leadership program.
projects.longDescription: A more detailed description of the project, including its features, challenges, and solutions.

projects.title: BizGPT2
projects.description: Second version of the BizGPT project. Based on a socratic coaching approach.
projects.longDescription: A more detailed description of the project, including its features, challenges, and solutions.

projects.title: Jaguar Land Rover 4x4 Challenge
projects.description: Built foundational tech for an educational STEM competition.
projects.longDescription: Developed baseline components including design and code for the Jaguar Land Rover 4x4 in Schools Technology Challenge, encouraging innovation and practical skills among young engineering students.

projects.title: VR Team-building Game
projects.description: Designed and piloted a VR-based corporate learning game.
projects.longDescription: Developed a Virtual Reality solution used for team-building exercises, incorporating immersive themes to enhance engagement. This early-stage pilot project demonstrated the potential for VR in experiential corporate learning.
